name: Cozy Downtown Apartment
description: A charming and cozy apartment located in the heart of downtown, just steps away from the best restaurants, shops, and attractions. Perfect for solo travelers or couples looking for a comfortable and convenient stay.
amenities: Wi-Fi, Kitchen, Free Parking, TV, Air Conditioning

name: Beachside Villa
description: Stunning villa with breathtaking ocean views. This property offers a private pool, direct beach access, and spacious living areas. Ideal for families or groups seeking a luxurious seaside escape.
amenities: Wi-Fi, Private Pool, Beach Access, Kitchen, Air Conditioning, TV

name: Mountain Cabin Retreat
description: Escape to this peaceful cabin nestled in the mountains. Enjoy hiking trails, wildlife, and serene forest views. The perfect getaway for nature lovers and those looking to disconnect and relax.
amenities: Wi-Fi, Kitchen, Fireplace, Hiking Trails, Pet-friendly

name: Urban Studio Loft
description: A stylish and modern loft in a trendy urban neighborhood. Features high ceilings, large windows, and contemporary design. Great for creatives and professionals.
